charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced on January 3, 2013, to 262 months on count 1 to be served concurrently with count 2, followed by 3 years supervised release on count 1 to be served concurrently with count 2. No fine. No restitution. $100 special assessment on each count for a total of $200.

charges.charge_description: UNLAWFUL TO IMPORT OR MANUFACTURE FIREARMS(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced on January 3, 2013, to 120 months on count 2 to be served concurrently with count 1 for a total of 262 months, followed by 3 years supervised release on count 2 to be served concurrently with count 1 for a total term of 3 years. No fine. No. restitution. $100 special assessment on each count for a total of $200.
